sentences.english: Red edge position (REP, 680-780 nm) has been used for evaluating crop leaves nitrogen status.
sentences.chinese: 红边位置常被用于监测作物叶片氮素营养状况。

sentences.english: Methods It was carried out in the line with the national monitoring scenario for KBD.
sentences.chinese: 方法按照国家大骨节病监测方案进行。

sentences.english: Conclusions It was proved feasibility of DNA fingerprints in the heredity monitoring of inbred strain rat.
sentences.chinese: 结论证实了该方法在近交系大鼠遗传监测中的可行性。

sentences.english: Vertical producing degree of super heavy oil reservoirs in Shul area is understood through monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 通过监测手段，了解曙一区超稠油油层纵向动用程度。

sentences.english: The present study demonstrated that neuromuscular monitoring improved endotracheal intubating conditions.
sentences.chinese: 本研究显示神经肌肉监测可改善插管条件。

sentences.english: This paper has described the application of remote sensing technology in environmental monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 本文将遥感技术在环境监测中的应用状况做了介绍。

sentences.english: Government requested to monitor into the pre-marital HIV testing project.
sentences.chinese: 政府要求将艾滋病监测纳入婚前检测项目。

sentences.english: Most children were not allowed to check blood glucose levels or administer insulin in class.
sentences.chinese: 大多数儿童不允许在班级监测血糖值及注射胰岛素。

sentences.english: To study the effect of dietary monitoring and problems in dietary survey.
sentences.chinese: 了解集体托幼机构膳食监测开展的效果及存在问题。

sentences.english: Traces of plutnonium were detected in samples taken on March 21 and 22.
sentences.chinese: 在21日和22日的土壤监测中，发现微量钚元素。

sentences.english: Monitor CBC and for mucositis weekly.

sentences.english: Stores and warehouses should monitor populations with pheromone traps.

sentences.english: Patients receiving long-term ketoconazole should be monitored for hepatotoxicity .

sentences.english: Electrical equipment monitors the power the buoy generates.
